trans-unit.source: Represents an interoperable binding that supports distributed transactions and secure, reliable sessions.
trans-unit.target: 表示互通的繫結程序，支援分散式異動和安全可靠的工作階段。

trans-unit.source: The wsHttpBinding is a secure, reliable, interoperable binding suitable for non-duplex service contracts.
trans-unit.target: wsHttpBinding 是安全、可靠且互通的繫結，適用於非雙工服務合約。

trans-unit.source: The binding implements the following specifications: WS-ReliableMessaging for reliability and WS-Security for message security and authentication.
trans-unit.target: 此繫結會實作下列規格：WS-ReliableMessaging 用於可靠性以及 WS-Security 用於訊息安全性和驗證。

trans-unit.source: The transport is HTTP and message encoding is Text/XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: 傳輸是 HTTP 而訊息編碼是 Text/XML 編碼。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpBindingElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpBindingElement" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpBindingElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpBindingElement" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The configuration name of the binding.
trans-unit.target: 繫結的組態名稱。

trans-unit.source: This value should be unique because it is used as identification for the binding.
trans-unit.target: 這個值應該是唯一的，因為它會當做繫結的識別使用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpBindingElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpBindingElement" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the WCF client will automatically store and resend any cookies sent by a single web service.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示 WCF 用戶端是否會自動儲存並重新傳送單一 Web 服務所傳送的任何 Cookie。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if automatic cookies processing is required; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果自動 Cookies 處理是必要的則為 <see langword="True" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpBindingElement.AllowCookies%2A> to `true` is useful when a client is interacting with one web service that uses cookies.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpBindingElement.AllowCookies%2A>至`true`當用戶端在使用 cookie 的其中一個 web 服務互動時相當實用。

trans-unit.source: If you are accessing multiple services with the same cookie, set <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpBindingElement.AllowCookies%2A> to `false` and you will have to manually add the cookie header to each outgoing message.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要存取多個服務使用相同的 cookie，請設定<xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpBindingElement.AllowCookies%2A>至`false`，而且您必須以手動方式將 cookie 標頭加入至每個外寄訊息。

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to do this:
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼會示範如何執行這項操作：

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of this binding element.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個繫結項目的型別。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of this binding element.
trans-unit.target: 這個繫結項目的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: A binding element.
trans-unit.target: 繫結項目。

trans-unit.source: Initializes this binding configuration element with the content of the specified binding element.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定之繫結項目的內容，初始化此繫結組態項目。

trans-unit.source: A collection of binding elements.
trans-unit.target: 繫結項目的集合。

trans-unit.source: Called when the content of a specified binding collection is applied to this binding configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 在指定之繫結集合的內容套用至這個繫結組態項目時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection" /> instance that contains a collection of <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty" /> objects that can be attributes or <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement" /> objects of this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection" /> 執行個體，其中包含可能是屬性之 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty" /> 物件的集合或這個組態項目之 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement" /> 物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection" /> instance that contains a collection of <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty" /> objects that can be attributes or <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement" /> objects of this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection" /> 執行個體，其中包含可能是屬性之 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty" /> 物件或這個組態項目之 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement" /> 物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of security to be used with this binding.
trans-unit.target: 取得要搭配此繫結使用的安全性類型。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpSecurityElement" /> that is used with this binding.
trans-unit.target: 搭配此繫結使用的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpSecurityElement" />。
